{{velocity wiki="true"}} #if(!$hasAdmin) {{warning}}You must be logged with admin rights to operate the Mail Archive. #else #if($request.debug) Entering DEBUG mode #end #if($request.simulate) Entering SIMULATION mode #end == Manage mail archive state == {{html}}
{{/html}} == Topics == (work in progress) $xwiki.jsx.use('MailArchive.LiveTable') #set($collist = [ "subject", "count", "author", "startdate", "lastupdatedate", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "subject" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "view", "sortable":"true", "filterable":"true", "html":"true" }, "count" : { "type" : "text", "sortable" : "false", "filterable": "false"}, "author" : { "type" : "text", "sortable":"true", "filterable":"true", "html" : "true" }, "startdate" : { "type" : "date", "link" : "view" }, "lastupdatedate" : { "type" : "date", "link" : "view" } } ) #set($options = { "className":"MailArchiveCode.MailTopicClass", "resultPage":"MailArchiveCode.LiveTableResults", "selectedColumn":"lastupdatedate", "tagCloud":"false", "defaultOrder":"desc", "translationPrefix" : "xe.mailarchive.", "rowCount": 10 }) #livetable("mailtopics" $collist $colprops $options) == Mails == #set($collist = [ "doc.title", "doc.name", "doc.author", "date", "_attachments"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.title" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "view", "sortable":"true", "filterable":"true", "html":"true" }, "doc.name" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "view", "sortable":"true", "filterable":"true", "html":"true" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "sortable":"true", "filterable":"true", "html" : "true" }, "date" : { "type" : "date", "link" : "view" } } ) #set($options = { "className":"MailArchiveCode.MailClass", "resultPage":"MailArchiveCode.LiveTableResults", "selectedColumn":"lastupdatedate", "tagCloud":"false", "defaultOrder":"desc", "translationPrefix" : "xe.mailarchive.", "rowCount": 10 }) #livetable("mails" $collist $colprops $options) === Purge Mails & Topics === * Purge All Mails & Topics (warning : not possible to recover ...) * Purge by date (older than ...) * Purge 1 Topic & all related mails (by id, title, after search) * Purge mails loaded during last loading session ? === Split Topics === (display list of subjects and select mail for split base, select new title for new topic) === Merge Topics === Select 2 topics, select 1 title for both (replace IDs in mails and topic, in msgid and refs) === Others === * Refresh timeline explicitely * Purge timeline data * Force refresh of users photos (if ldap & ldap photo) * Force creation of missing users from LDAP (if ldap) #end {{/velocity}}
